title: Claimant pay details
p1: It may help the tribunal if you can provide these details. You will not be penalised for not providing them.

howOftenClaimantPaid.label: How often was the claimant paid?
howOftenClaimantPaid.hintLabel: Use the same time period (weekly, monthly or annual) that the claimant used on the ET1 form.

claimantPayBeforeTax.label: Enter the claimant’s pay BEFORE tax (optional)

claimantNormalTakeHomePay.label: Enter the claimant’s normal take-home pay (optional)
claimantNormalTakeHomePay.hintLabel:
Take-home pay is the pay after tax and insurance deductions.

Include overtime, commission and bonuses.

furtherInfoAboutClaimantPayDetails.label: Do you want to provide any further information about the claimant's pay details? (optional)

howOftenClaimantPaid.required: Tell us how often the claimant was paid
